Class GameContext

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.GameContext
public class GameContext extends Object
Acts as the controller for a single match instance.

This class coordinates the interaction between the GameModel (game logic/data), the GamePhase (current state of game logic), and the clients through ServerController. It supports phase-based delegation (State Pattern) and queued client actions (Command Pattern).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Constructs a new game context for a given match.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameContext

      public GameContext(FlightBoard.Type flightType, int numPlayers, ServerController serverController)
      Constructs a new game context for a given match.
      Parameters:
      flightType - the flight board type (defines game mode/level).
      numPlayers - the number of players for this game.
      serverController - the controller responsible for network communication.

  • Method Details

    • sendAction

      public void sendAction(String username, ServerAction action)
      Sends a server-to-client action.
      Parameters:
      username - the target player username.
      action - the action to send.

      public void addClientAction(ClientGameAction clientGameAction)
      Adds a new client-issued action to the execution queue.
      Parameters:
      clientGameAction - the action to enqueue.

      Sets the current phase of the game.
      Parameters:

    • connectPlayerToGame

      public void connectPlayerToGame(String playerUsername) throws FullLobbyException, UsernameAlreadyTakenException
      Connects a new player to the game lobby.
      Parameters:
      playerUsername - the username of the player to add.
      Throws:
      FullLobbyException - if the lobby has reached the max number of players.
      UsernameAlreadyTakenException - if the username is already taken.

    • chooseColor

      public void chooseColor(String username, String chosenColor)
      Assigns a chosen color to a player.
      Parameters:
      username - the player's username.
      chosenColor - the color chosen by the player.

    • getPlayersColor

      public Map<String,String> getPlayersColor()
      Retrieves the colors chosen by all players.
      Returns:
      a map of usernames to colors.

    • getFreeShipCard

      public ShipCard getFreeShipCard(String username, ShipCard shipCard)
      Returns a free ship card.
      Parameters:
      username - The player requesting the card.
      shipCard - the requested card, null if the user is requiring a covered one
      Returns:
      The requested ship card.

    • releaseShipCard

      Releases a previously reserved or unused ship card.
      Parameters:
      username - The player releasing the card.
      shipCard - The card to release.

      public ShipBoard placeShipCard(String username, ShipCard shipCard, ShipCard.Orientation orientation, int x, int y)
      Places a ship card onto the player's ship board.
      Parameters:
      username - The player placing the card.
      shipCard - The card being placed.
      orientation - The orientation of the card.
      x - X coordinate on the ship board.
      y - Y coordinate on the ship board.
      Returns:
      The updated ship board.

      Parameters:
      username - The player repairing the ship.
      cardsToEliminateX - X-coordinates of damaged cards.
      cardsToEliminateY - Y-coordinates of damaged cards.

      Parameters:

      pos - The new position.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()

    • getAdventureCard

      public AdventureCard getAdventureCard(String username)
      Allows the first player in the turn order to draw the current adventure card.
      Parameters:
      username - the player requesting the card; must be the first in turn order.
      Returns:
      the drawn AdventureCard.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player is not the first in the queue.

    • acceptAdventureCard

      public void acceptAdventureCard(String username)
      Accepts the currently drawn adventure card and applies its effects to the player.
      Parameters:
      username - the player accepting the card.

    • declineAdventureCard

      public void declineAdventureCard(String username)
      Declines the currently drawn adventure card, causing the effects to be skipped or alternatives applied.
      Parameters:
      username - the player declining the card.

    • killMembers

      public Player killMembers(String username, Map<HousingUnit,Integer> housingUsage)
      Kills crew members from the player’s ship based on specified housing units to be emptied.
      Parameters:
      username - the player performing the action.
      housingUsage - map from HousingUnit to number of crew to remove.
      Returns:
      the updated Player after the action.

    • chooseMaterials

      public Player chooseMaterials(String username, Map<Storage,AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<List<Material>,List<Material>>> storageMaterials)
      Allows the player to choose which materials to keep and which to discard in each storage unit.
      Parameters:
      username - the player making the selection.
      storageMaterials - map from Storage to a pair of lists (toKeep, toDiscard).
      Returns:
      the updated Player after the selection.

    • chooseFirePower

      public Player chooseFirePower(String username, Map<Battery,Integer> batteries, List<Cannon> doubleCannons)
      Allows the player to select which batteries to use and which double cannons to activate.
      Parameters:
      username - the player activating firepower.
      batteries - map from Battery to units of charge to use.
      doubleCannons - list of Cannon representing double-cannons to activate.
      Returns:
      the updated Player after firing.

    • rewardDecision

      public Player rewardDecision(String username, boolean decision)
      Accepts or refuses a reward offered by the adventure card.
      Parameters:
      username - the player making the decision.
      decision - true to accept the reward, false to refuse.
      Returns:
      the updated Player reflecting the choice.

    • getCoordinate

      public Hit getCoordinate(String username)
      Returns the coordinates targeted by an external hit (e.g., meteor, enemy fire).
      Parameters:
      username - the player under attack.
      Returns:
      the coordinates of the impact as a Hit.

    • handleShot

      public Player handleShot(String username, Map<Battery,Integer> batteries)
      Handles incoming damage by choosing which batteries to use for defense.
      Parameters:
      username - the player responding to the shot.
      batteries - batteries to be consumed for defense.
      Returns:
      the updated Player after handling the shot.

    • useBatteries

      public Player useBatteries(String username, Map<Battery,Integer> batteries)
      Explicitly uses selected batteries (e.g., for powering engines or weapons).
      Parameters:
      username - the player using the batteries.
      batteries - batteries with amount of energy to consume.
      Returns:
      the updated Player after energy consumption.

    • landOnPlanet

      public List<Material> landOnPlanet(String username, int numPlanet)
      Handles the event where the player lands on a planet and gains its benefits.
      Parameters:
      username - the player landing on the planet.
      numPlanet - the index of the planet.
      Returns:
      the list of materials available on the chosen planet

    • chooseEnginePower

      public Player chooseEnginePower(String username, Map<Battery,Integer> batteries)
      Chooses how much engine power to use (e.g., to advance in order or avoid hazards).
      Parameters:
      username - the player using engine power.
      batteries - batteries and energy amount to activate engines.
      Returns:
      the updated Player after applying engine power.

    • meteorDefense

      public Player meteorDefense(String username, Map<Battery,Integer> batteries, Cannon cannon)
      Handles defense against a meteor impact, using batteries and optionally a cannon.
      Parameters:
      username - the player defending.
      batteries - batteries to activate defense.
      cannon - cannon to be fired (may be null).
      Returns:
      the updated Player after the defense.

    • selectAliens

      public void selectAliens(String username, AlienUnit alienUnit, HousingUnit housingUnit)
      Allows a player to assign an AlienUnit to a specific HousingUnit on their ship.

      This action is valid only in the SelectAlienUnitState and may be performed only once per player. After calling completedAlienSelection(String), the player can no longer select alien units.

      Parameters:
      username - the player performing the assignment
      alienUnit - the alien unit to be assigned
      housingUnit - the housing unit where the alien should be placed
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the current phase does not allow alien selection

    • completedAlienSelection

      public void completedAlienSelection(String username)
      Marks the alien selection process as completed for the given player.

      Once all players have completed this phase, the game transitions automatically to the next appropriate adventure state.

      Parameters:
      username - the player completing the alien selection
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the player has already completed selection or the phase is invalid

    • setTestDeck

      public void setTestDeck(String username)
